sentences.en: a scarf with a bold floral pattern
sentences.cn: 印有鲜艳花卉图案的围巾

sentences.en: Among them, water lives to animal, floral, grow a decision action.
sentences.cn: 其中, 水对动物 、 植物的生存 、 生长起决定作用.

sentences.en: Bouquet: Aromatic floral notes with suggestions of citrus flower.
sentences.cn: 香气: 浓郁的花香,以及少许柑橘花的香气.

sentences.en: Each room is distinctively decorated with light, bright colors and floral prints.
sentences.cn: 每个房间都以淡雅或鲜艳的颜色和印花图案装饰成独特的风格。

sentences.en: Floral and fruity notes, just enough spicy after maturing in vats.
sentences.cn: 带有浓郁的花香和水果香的味道, 在大桶中发酵后口感略带辛辣.

sentences.en: Floral wallpaper adorned the walls of the guest room.
sentences.cn: 客房的墙上裱糊着有花卉图案的壁纸.

sentences.en: He chose a nice material with a floral pattern for the curtains.
sentences.cn: 他选了块很好的带有花卉图案的料子做窗帘.

sentences.en: In September, floral fragrance; September, autumn; in September, teachers stage.
sentences.cn: 九月, 花果飘香; 九月, 秋高气爽; 九月, 老师的舞台.

sentences.en: In this living room we've mixed glorious floral prints.
sentences.cn: 在这间客厅，我们粘贴了各种美丽的印花纸。

sentences.en: Nose and elegant nose with attractive fruity, floral and citrus fruit aromas.
sentences.cn: 芳香:优雅、馥郁 、 迷人的柑橘属水果的果香及花的清香.

sentences.en: Perfume Features: The main tone of acetaldehyde rose floral notes.
sentences.cn: 香水特色: 以玫瑰为主调的乙醛花香调.

sentences.en: There is a floral border round the mouth of the vase.
There were floral tributes (= flowers sent as a sign of respect after someone has died ) from his colleagues.
There's a floral pattern on the curtain.
They lighted incense and candles and heaped floral tributes to the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们点燃蜡烛、熏香,为死难者献上花环.

sentences.en: Vintage caf é curtains in a graphic floral pattern add whimsy.
sentences.cn: 古典风格的带有生动花纹的窗帘如锦上添花.

sentences.en: We are not very keen on floral patterns and fussy designs.
sentences.cn: 我们不是很喜欢花卉图案和过于繁琐的设计。

words.tran_cn: 花的；植物的，植物群的；花似的

trans.tran_cn: 花的，花似的，以花装饰的，植物的，植物群的，花神的
trans.tran_en: made of flowers or decorated with flowers or pictures of flowers
